#include<stdio.h>
main()
{
	long int t;
	long long int n,p,a,b;
	scanf("%ld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&p);
		a=n%10;b=p%4;
		if(p==0)
		printf("1\n");
		else
		{
			switch(a)
			{
				case 0:
					printf("0\n");
					break;
				case 1:
				printf("1\n");
				break;
				case 2:
				{
					if(b==1)
					printf("%lld\n",a);
					else if(b==2)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a%10);
					else if(b==3)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a%10);
					else
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a*a%10);
					break;
				}
				case 3:
				{
					if(b==1)
					printf("%lld\n",a);
					else if(b==2)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a%10);
					else if(b==3)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a%10);
					else
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a*a%10);
					break;
				}
				case 4:
				{
					if(b==1)
					printf("%lld\n",a);
					else if(b==2)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a%10);
					else if(b==3)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a%10);
					else
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a*a%10);
					break;
				}
				case 5:
					printf("5\n");
					break;
				case 6:
					printf("6\n");
					break;
				case 7:
				{
					if(b==1)
					printf("%lld\n",a);
					else if(b==2)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a%10);
					else if(b==3)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a%10);
					else
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a*a%10);
					break;
				}
				case 8:
				{
					if(b==1)
					printf("%lld\n",a);
					else if(b==2)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a%10);
					else if(b==3)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a%10);
					else
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a*a%10);
					break;
				}
				case 9:
				{
					if(b==1)
					printf("%lld\n",a);
					else if(b==2)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a%10);
					else if(b==3)
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a%10);
					else
					printf("%lld\n",a*a*a*a%10);
					break;
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
